sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Tensions mount between Washington and Moscow after a Russian fighter jet struck an American surveillance drone over the Black Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Frayed relations between Washington and Moscow have become even more tense after a Russian fighter jet struck an American surveillance drone over the Black Sea on Tuesday, forcing the US to bring it down in international waters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The White House is calling it reckless and unsafe, while Moscow has described it as a provocation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: What we saw, again, were fighter aircraft dumping fuel in front of this UAV and then getting so close to the aircraft that it actually damaged the propeller on the MQ-9. Because of the damage, we were in a position to have to essentially crash it into the Black Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russia's ambassador to the U.S. was later summoned to the State Department, but not before justifying the actions of the Russian pilots.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This drone can carry 1, 1700 kilos of explosives. This drone can carry a few bombs. You see that what will be reaction of United States if you see such Russian drone very close for example to San Francisco or New York what will be reaction of United States for me it's clear Russian and US aircraft have operated over the Black Sea since the start of the war but this is the first known interaction the Pentagon has warned such actions could lead to miscalculation and unintended escalation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Orthodox monks from Kiev's 11th-century Pechesk Lavra monastery are fighting eviction by the Ukrainian government because of their church's links with Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The ancient golden-domed religious complex is the country's most significant Orthodox monastery.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Until recently, the monks-in- in residence fell under Moscow's jurisdiction.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: However, they say they broke with the Russian Orthodox Church after its leader, Patriarch Kirill, backed the invasion of Ukraine last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Kyiv's government remains unconvinced, but the monks deny any Kremlin links. I don't know how they formulate who we are for them, enemies, to do.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It is certainly not so.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This is not true.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This is our people, this is our land.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And this is our Lavra, which is ours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Despite numerous cars having been seen leaving the monastery, its head, Pavlo Libid, stood outside vowing no intention of moving, even though the lease has already been terminated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukraine has recently established its own branch of the Orthodox Church, but Moscow's Patriarchate refuses to recognize it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A prominent German politician has issued a scathing assessment of her country's drive to boost its military following Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Parliamentary Commissioner for the Armed Forces Eva Hügel claims not a single Euro of a 100 billion Euro fund approved by MPs had been spent. I will start with the subject of material.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The Bundeswehr has too little of everything.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: And since 24 February 2022, it has even less.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This concerns the training, the exercises and the equipment used.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Last year, Chancellor Scholz received a standing ovation in parliament when he announced the end of Germany's pacifist tradition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The policy included a commitment to NATO's spending target of 2% of GDP for defence, as well as the new Special Military Fund.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Hügel also cast doubt over whether a goal of recruiting 203,000 soldiers by 2031 would be achieved.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Her criticism joins a chorus of lawmakers and officials who have called for faster supplies and funding for the military.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Despite the lack of spending on its own forces, Germany has sent large amounts of military aid to Ukraine over the past year and recently promised to send its highly sought-after Leopard 2 tanks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The centre of Kramatorsk in eastern Ukraine was the target of fresh Russian bombings on Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In an all-too-familiar scene, residential buildings were hit, at least one person was killed and several others injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: According to local authorities, the Russian strikes damaged nine apartment blocks and a children's preschool.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Kramatorsk has been a significant battleground since 2014, when pro-Russian forces occupied Donetsk before being driven out in July 2014, bringing the city back under Ukrainian control.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: These attacks come as Sergei Shoigu, the Russian defense minister, ordered the doubling of the production of precision-guided weapons during a visit to one of Russia's leading arms manufacturers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In the east, Ukrainian forces on the front line continue to be pounded by Russian artillery.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: On Tuesday, the Ukrainian Interior Ministry said Russian forces launched deadly rocket strikes against civilian infrastructure in Sumy and the Donetsk region. A replica of the concrete punishment cell that Kremlin

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: critic Alexei Navalny is periodically held in has been unveiled near the Louvre in Paris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The installation shows the conditions that the opposition politician has been subjected to in the penal colony in the Vladimir region where he is being detained.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Navalny has spent more than 100 awareness of the dire conditions he faces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Russian lower house has approved an amendment,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: which, if approved by the upper house and President Putin, will punish anyone who publishes false information or attempts to discredit the volunteer groups fighting in Ukraine with up to 15 years in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This is an extension of the laws passed by the Russian government a year ago, credit the volunteer groups fighting in Ukraine with up to 15 years in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This is an extension of the laws passed by the Russian government a year ago, which sought to suppress any criticism of the so-called special military operation in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Yevgeny Prigozhin, leader of the mercenary group Wagner, welcomed the news, having asked the Russian parliament in January to extend the laws to ban negative media reports about his men.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Up until now, it was only Russia's military that was protected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This comes on the same day that the Lithuanian parliament declared Wagner a terrorist group.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In its resolution, it states that Russian mercenaries have committed serious crimes, which amounts to terrorism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Wagner has played an important role in Russia's offensive, but the battle of Bakhmut has revealed tensions between the group's leadership and the Russian army.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: President Biden has made another bid to tighten gun control in the U.S.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: He signed an executive order to increase the number of background checks needed before being able to buy a firearm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The order is aimed at moving the U.S. as close to universal background checks as possible without additional legislation and does not need the approval of Congress.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: At present, laws vary from state to state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Last year, Biden attempted to push a law banning assault weapons, but it's unlikely to get far with Republicans in control of the U.S. House of Representatives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad is in Moscow to meet with his top ally, Russian President Vladimir Putin,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: as the Kremlin steps up efforts to restore ties between Turkey and Syria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The visit comes on the anniversary of the uprising-turned-civil war in Syria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Moscow has played a pivotal role in fighting back armed opposition groups trying to topple Assad's government through its military support and has aggressively backed Damascus against opponents at the United Nations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In a statement, the Kremlin said the talks would aim to strengthen ties in political, trade, economic and humanitarian spheres, as well as the prospects for a comprehensive settlement of the situation in and around Syria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Russian media said relations between Damascus and Ankara would also be on the table.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The civil war in Syria has killed nearly half a million people and displaced half the country's pre-war population.
